full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 REMITTER: VALERIO LAMBERT, M. U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE FILING DATE: 04/15/88 FOR: M. VALERIO LAMBERT IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE A NUMBER: A91318117 QDE: 0035600 201 WEST 24TH ST. (3RD FL.) BANK NO: 091900533 INTERVIEW DATE: 06/02/88 NEW YORK, NY 10001 RECEIPT NUMBER: XMA881388005 INTERVIEW TIME: 08:30 AM FEE TYPE: CMD AMOUNT: 185.00 FORM NO.: I687L THIS LETTER IS TO ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT OF YOUR APPLICATION FOR LEGALIZATION. YOU ARE SCHEDULED TO APPEAR FOR AN INTERVIEW WITH A LEGALIZATION OFFICER ON 06/02/88. PLEASE BRING ANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS WHICH SUPPORT YOUR APPLICATION. IF YOU FAIL TO APPEAR AT THE DESIGNATED TIME AND PLACE, YOUR APPLICATION FOR LEGALIZATION MAY BE DENIED. THIS IS NOT AN AUTHORIZATION TO TRAVEL OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES. THIS DOCUMENT BECOMES INVALID FOR ANY PURPOSE IF IT IS ALTERED. THIS DOCUMENT MAY ONLY BE DUPLICATED BY AN EMPLOYER FOR VERIFICATION PURPOSES. IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU CARRY THIS DOCUMENT WITH YOU AT ALL TIMES. YOU ARE GRANTED EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZATION WHICH EXPIRES ON 06/02/88. YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED EMPLOYMENT BEYOND THAT DATE. MEDARDA VALERIO LAMBERT INTERVIEW DATE: 06/02/88 2217 8TH AVENUE 3J INTERVIEW TIME: 08:30 NEW YORK, NY 10026 REPORT TO THE ADDRESS AT THE TOP CENTER OF THIS LETTER, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE ON THE DATE AND TIME STATED ABOVE. vice INS COPY FORM NO. I689 5/87
